assessment_steps.extracted_paper_info: Parkinson’s disease (PD) is the second most common neurodegenerative disorder in the world. The most common attributable cause of PD is mutation of the kinase encoded by the LRRK2 gene.

assessment_steps.step_name: Step 2: Evaluate applicability of general classes of assay used in the field
